title: discovering
extract: to be the first to find or find out about: Fleming discovered penicillin. 2. to learn about or encounter for the first time; realize: she discovered the pleasures of wine. 3. to find after study or search: I discovered a leak in the tank.
extract_html: to be the first to find or find out about: Fleming discovered penicillin. 2. to learn about or encounter for the first time; realize: she discovered the pleasures of wine. 3. to find after study or search: I discovered a leak in the tank.
